transcript.text: And let's go !
My friends, today we are going to talk about something dear to my heart
And actually I am going to tell you a story
Before we start
A story, obviously, in connection with the video, with what we're gonna do after I tell it to you, don't worry
It's the story of a little boy named Hauchard Lucas
And this child had great difficulty differentiating blue from pink and from gray
Here's the end of this very short story

So ! My friends, i think that i'm 
Colorblind, but you know there are multiple kinds of daltonism
About different colors etc.. SO
And i'm having trouble with colors like blue, pink, grey you know
And i'm talking about these ones because they are the most blatant, and i had a lot of trouble with my family about that because i was like "NO, THIS IS PINK"
And they were like "no, Lucas, it's blue, really"
SHUT UP IT'S PINK !
Annnnnnnd it was before i figured out what color blindness was, quite simply
Color blindness is genetic, it means that there's someone in your family that gave it to you
SO, someone sent me by mail this site "enchroma" that allows us to do a test of your color vision
I think that it's only about seeing numbers in some... color things
For exemple, here i don't see anything, but it's normal i guess ?
Here's a 5
(clicking on start test)
Instructions (you can set pause to read it, he's just reading it in French!)
Ok, so there's nothing easier!
Ok here we goooooo
SO, here it's 1, we can really see it, wow like if you don't see it,  so you are ehmmmmmmm VERY colorblind
I don't know the name of different daltonism forms, but the only difference is that some people don't see the color green, the color red, etc...
It's like how to explain it...The perception of certain colors is altered
But it's not the same colors that are altered, it depends
SO, it's 1, we won't lie to ourselves, it's a... OHOHOH?
Squeezie : Yes, hello? *girl voice* Hello
Squeezie : Hello ? *Girl voice* Hello i'm your SFR (mobile network) advisor and...
Lucas : very good.  Ehmmmmm SO
Seriously, dude, they have been calling me 3 times a day for 10 days, I've got enough of it
More, i'm not even suscribed to them anymore, LEAVE ME THE F*CK ALONE
Stop forcing me !
Moreover, what we are doing is important.
It's a 6 ! It's obvious
! This isn't the same color, it's red with green underneath.
Damn i would like them to explain us like if you don't see the figure, here for example, what kind of daltonism you got !
Here it's okay, it's an 8
Woooow this one is so hard
But I think it is hard for you too, finally it's an 8 we can see it
WTF? Oh no no ok there's a "nothing" button, so there's nothing !
They made me afraid!
It's a 9
Wow this is blatant, when it's blue over green I can see it very good, it's weird because it's some colors that give me troubles in real life
Here's 1, i'm going so fast in fact!
WAIT, i have the feeling that there's a figure to see, and that the further i go, the better i will see it
No no there's nothing, here are some pink things but i don't think that it's a figure
Wooow, it's getting harder! I think that i can see a 5.
It's getting sooo hard, damn, it's terrible!
So, there's obviously a 5.
Here's a 2
6? What's that? It looks like an S or a 0
It's a 6 my friends, it's obvious, it's 6
It's 7, seriously when it's blatant like this, it's impressive
Anyways, John Dalton, the guy that discovered daltonism
Because he was himself colorblind
I think that he's the one that had the best confusions with another guy in the world
The story about the blue/pink robe took place for like 2 hours
But him (John) was like "the robe is pink" for 10 days
SO, here's... nothing
Damn this is so blatant! Imo if you don't see the 3, so your daltonism is like very edgy
Here's a 6, here's nothing, wait there's a 3 !
OH DAMN THIS IS IT! This is what i can't see that good ! That's it !
But now i can't see the 3 anymore, NOOO
This is what i see very bad, damnnn
So it's really green/blue (that he can't see) shit
Here's nothing, i'm not idiot
3, yeah
1, yeah
5, got some troubles with this one also but it's ok
here's 7?
4, obviously
Damn guys i guess that it's not really entertaining for you, but i'm very exciting to see what's my daltonism !
Oh shit, what's that ??
Big imitation of someone that's cleaning his glasses, right?
Nope, it's 4
There's nothing...
There's a 2, really things are getting reallyyyy harder to see, really
it wont surprise me if some of you couldn't see the figures, but still that aren't colorblind
It's a 5 ? ...
Dude it's sooo hard to see, awesome !
Dude i have to focus so hard, it's terrible
Wow this one is so... No no joke, joke, joke.
It's a 1, obviously
Another 1 ? Yes, another
WTF? Wait i'm dumb i shouldn't stand up, because when you stand up/down, screen's colors aren't the same
No, really ! When you are down it's darker, and when you are up it's brighter
I teach you things, i couldn't explain it but i'm still teaching !
18 figures later
Oh? I think it's finish
I'm "mild deutan"
(just reading what's on screen in french)
Really? I can't believe it ! It's sure that everyone that was looking the video have trouble with the red on green things !
No ? Oh i don't know, maybe i say that but in fact, not at all, damn it's funny
(still reading)
So as a result, greens yellows, oranges, reds and browns may appear similar
No at all, dude, really not at all
Especially in low light
even less
It can also be hard to figure out the difference between blue, purple, pink or grey
Here we are ! Yes dude ! It's funny !
Here it fits ! But is it the chance or not dude ?
It's pretty hard because the first part don't really fit to me, or i didn't notice my troubles with these colors (yellow green orange red)
But after all, about blue, purple, pink and grey, dude that's all, pink and grey !
Damn, damn
You know what ? We gonna call my grandmother and we gonna ask her which colors my grandfather had troubles to see
*grandmother* Hello ?
Squeezie : How are you?
*grandmother* fine and you ?
Squeezie : everything is great
Squeezie : In fact i did a video where i was doing a colorblind test
*grandmother* yes ?
Squeezie : And they say to me that i have some troubles with blue, purple, grey and pink
Do you remember the colors that grandfather had troubles to see?
*grandmother* yeah blue/grey it is sure !
Squeezie : Funny because it's the same with me !
*grandmother* (talking at the same time as squeezie) he had some troubles with clothing !
Squeezie : Did you had some issues about that ?
*grandmother* Of course we did ! We where not ok about colors !
He was like "i see this color !" but it wasn't the good color !
Squeezie : he was stubborn ?
*grandmother* Oh ! Yes !
Squeezie : So here we are, it's very cool that you remember it !
*grandmother* like his suits, he was buying pants etc but we was always in conflict about colors!
Squeezie : Haha it's funny ! So that's all, it is a mystery elucidated because of you
Squeezie : So i thank you very much and see you soon !
*grandmother* don't worry no problem
Squeezie : Alot of kisses grandmother
*grandmother* kisses to you and have a good day !
Squeezie : You too, kisses my grandmother !
*grandmother* see you soon !
Squeezie : See you soon, I love you, kisses !
Isn't Mauricette wonderfull ?
She's so cute !
Concede that we all want to wheedle her !
So my friends it's already the end of this video ! Don't hesitate to leave a like if you enjoyed it
So listen I... I.. I'm very happy because i found out which daltonism i have
So it's just a bad perception of green color !
I'm about to make a coffee, and I say goodbye to you !
